aboutUsInfo.infoStart: has been operating since 2018. Later, due to its conscientious and high-quality service delivery, the company quickly won the trust of customers. At the moment, `New Mobile' presents specialized stores in the city of Yerevan and Masis. Being faithful, the company cooperates only with global brands producing high-quality products, such as: Samsung, Nokia, Apple, Lenovo, Motorola, HTC, Sony, Canyon, ACME, Remax and other brands. 'New Mobile'
aboutUsInfo.infoEnd: offers its customers only quality products, providing a 1-year official warranty directly from the manufacturer. The company offers its customers not only mobile phones, but also various types of equipment: computers, tablets, etc. The company's stores work 7 days a week, the company cooperates with almost all the leading banks operating in Armenia, the installment is formulated on the spot and all this is aimed only at customers making comfortable, fast and profitable purchases. Despite the huge volumes of the high-quality product range of existing equipment, thanks to its adopted policy, the company grows and expands day by day, presenting its customers with a wider and modern range of equipment.
